explains: n. 付薪水的支票，薪水

sentences.en: I'm fine; except I have a question about my paycheck.
sentences.cn: 我很好，只是我有一个关于我薪水的问题。

sentences.en: If your paycheck seems to be disappearing into thin air, you may be stuck in money traps.
sentences.cn: 如果你的薪水像是消失不见了，你可能已经陷入金钱陷阱。

sentences.en: She decided to wait for her next work-study paycheck, which was typically $150-$200, to pay for the code.
sentences.cn: 她决定等到下一个勤工俭学的薪水——通常是150到200美元——来支付代码的费用。
